sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Users, TrendingUp, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; import { DashboardStats, RiskScore } from '../types'; interface DashboardProps { stats: DashboardStats; riskScores: RiskScore[]; } const Dashboard: React.FC = ({ stats, riskScores }) => { // Prepare data for charts const riskDistributionData = [ { name: 'Low Risk', value: stats.low_risk_count, color: '#22c55e' }, { name: 'Medium Risk', value: stats.medium_risk_count, color: '#f59e0b' }, { name: 'High Risk', value: stats.high_risk_count, color: '#ef4444' } ]; const scoreRangeData = [ { range: '0-20', count: riskScores.filter(s => s.risk_score <= 20).length }, { range: '21-40', count: riskScores.filter(s => s.risk_score > 20 && s.risk_score <= 40).length }, { range: '41-60', count: riskScores.filter(s => s.risk_score > 40 && s.risk_score <= 60).length }, { range: '61-80', count: riskScores.filter(s => s.risk_score > 60 && s.risk_score <= 80).length }, { range: '81-100', count: riskScores.filter(s => s.risk_score > 80).length } ]; return (
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Users

{stats.total_users}

Approval Rate

{stats.approval_rate.toFixed(1)}%

High Risk

{stats.high_risk_count}

Low Risk

{stats.low_risk_count}

{/* Charts */}
{/* Risk Distribution Pie Chart */}

Risk Distribution

`${name}: ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="value" > {riskDistributionData.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* Score Range Bar Chart */}

Score Distribution

{/* Decision Summary */}

Decision Summary

{riskScores.filter(s => s.decision === 'Approve').length}

Approved

{riskScores.filter(s => s.decision === 'Review').length}

Under Review

{riskScores.filter(s => s.decision === 'Reject').length}

Rejected

); }; export default Dashboard;
